def_cn: (法律、制度或体系)严格的，刻板的，不可变更的
def_en: Laws, rules, or systems that are rigid cannot be changed or varied, and are therefore considered to be rather severe.
If you disapprove of someone because you think they are not willing to change their way of thinking or behaving, you can describe them as rigid .

def_cn: 坚硬的;刚性的;不易弯曲的
def_en: A rigid substance or object is stiff and does not bend, stretch, or twist easily.

def_cn: (常因震惊或害怕)身体僵直的，不能动弹的，呆住的
def_en: If someone goes rigid, their body becomes very straight and stiff, usually as a result of shock or fear.
